SELECT szp.`id` AS id, szp.`clientType` AS clientType, szp.gameId AS gameId, bg.gameName AS gameName, szp.`zoneId` AS zoneId, bgz.`zoneName` AS zoneName, szp.`platformId` AS platformId, SUM(szp.totalRoleUser) AS totalRoledUser, SUM(szp.totalRegUser) AS totalRegUser, SUM(szp.activeUsers) AS activeUsers, SUM(szp.devices) AS devices, SUM(szp.payAmount) AS payAmount, SUM(szp.payTimes) AS payTimes, SUM(szp.payUsers) AS payUsers FROM s_zone_platform_history szp JOIN b_game bg ON bg.id=szp.gameId JOIN b_game_zone bgz ON bgz.gameId=szp.gameId AND bgz.zoneId=szp.zoneId
GROUP BY szp.zoneId,szp.gameId

SELECT SUM(szp.devices) AS devices, SUM(szp.payAmount) AS payAmount, SUM(szp.payTimes) AS payTimes, SUM(szp.payUsers) AS payUsers, SUM(szp.totalRoleUser) AS totalRoledUser, SUM(szp.totalRegUser) AS totalRegUser, SUM(szp.activeUsers) AS activeUsers, szp.`zoneId` AS zoneId, szp.gameId AS gameId, szp.`platformId` AS platformId, bgz.`zoneName` AS zoneName, bg.gameName AS gameName, bp.platformName AS platformName FROM s_zone_platform_history szp JOIN b_game bg ON bg.id=szp.gameId JOIN b_game_zone bgz ON bgz.gameId=szp.gameId AND bgz.zoneId=szp.zoneId JOIN b_platform bp ON szp.platformId=bp.id
GROUP BY bgz.`zoneName`,bp.platformName ORDER BY szp.zoneId

SELECT SUM(szp.devices) AS devices, SUM(szp.payAmount) AS payAmount, SUM(szp.payTimes) AS payTimes, SUM(szp.payUsers) AS payUsers, SUM(szp.totalRoleUser) AS totalRoledUser, SUM(szp.totalRegUser) AS totalRegUser, SUM(szp.activeUsers) AS activeUsers, szp.`zoneId` AS zoneId, szp.gameId AS gameId, szp.`platformId` AS platformId, bgz.`zoneName` AS zoneName, bg.gameName AS gameName, bp.platformName AS platformName FROM s_zone_platform_history szp JOIN b_game bg ON bg.id=szp.gameId JOIN b_game_zone bgz ON bgz.gameId=szp.gameId AND bgz.zoneId=szp.zoneId JOIN b_platform bp ON szp.platformId=bp.id
GROUP BY bgz.`zoneName`,bp.platformName ORDER BY szp.platformId
